shortcuts.name: Open New Tab
shortcuts.description: Opens a new tab in Microsoft Edge.

shortcuts.name: Close Tab
shortcuts.description: Closes the current tab in Microsoft Edge.

shortcuts.name: Reopen Closed Tab
shortcuts.description: Reopens the last closed tab in Microsoft Edge.

shortcuts.name: Open History
shortcuts.description: Opens the browsing history in Microsoft Edge.

shortcuts.name: Open Downloads
shortcuts.description: Opens the downloads page in Microsoft Edge.
